summary: Tested Badge Showcase and Progress APIs and Frontend. Backend APIs all working correctly (14/14 tests passed). Fixed critical frontend import bug in badges.tsx. Found design issue: 'My Badges' link missing from desktop profile activity section.

integration_issues.issue: Desktop layout 'Your Activity' section only has 4 items (My Listings, Favorites, Messages, Offers). Missing 'My Badges' link that exists in mobile layout.

action_items: Add 'My Badges' link to desktop profile activity section (around line 1130-1155 in profile.tsx)
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Import path in badges.tsx was wrong - changed from '../../src/services/api' to '../../src/utils/api'

success_rate.frontend: 90% (badges page working after fix, desktop profile missing My Badges link)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Badge showcase and progress APIs are fully functional. Frontend badges page (/profile/badges) works correctly after import fix. Desktop profile page needs 'My Badges' link added to activity grid. All 10 automatic badges shown with progress indicators working correctly.
